title: Influencer Allegation Crisis Response
description: Company leaders debate how to react after a celebrity influencer claims on social media that the firm uses child labour in its supply chain.

agents.persona: Seeks a swift, narrative-owning statement and evaluates press-release timing.
Highlights legal exposure, defamation angles, and wording that avoids admitting liability.
Knows factory audits inside out and can surface compliance documents quickly.
Champions ethical sourcing, proposes third-party verification, and stresses transparency.
Monitors sentiment graphs in real time and crafts platform-specific rebuttals.
